thread.title: Caleb Gibson

author: Caleb Gibson
title: Caleb Gibson
text: I wanted some custom lettering for a computer case and a friend recommended I check out doityourselflettering.com and I was not disappointed! There were many fonts to choose from and the ordering process was very easy. The custom decal was a very good price and arrived in a short amount of time. It also came with some handy instructions in how to best apply the decal to a surface.
